REV. FR. MARCUS BONIFACE MENDIS,​ of the Archdiocese of Colombo,​ expired on Friday the 03rd of May 2024. He is the beloved son of the late Mr Siman Valantine and late Mrs Francisca Meraya Fernando. Remains of Rev. Fr. Marcus Boniface Mendis lie in state at Sts. Peter & Paul Church,​ Ragama from Friday,​ 03rd of May 8.00 p.m. to Saturday,​ 04th of May 8.00 a.m. and thereafter transferred to the St. Joseph’s Church,​ Uyana,​ Moratuwa. Funeral will be held on Saturday,​ the 04th of May. The Requiem Mass will be at 3.00 p.m. followed by Burial at the St. Joseph’s Church Cemetery at Uyana,​ Moratuwa. Archbishop’s House,​ Borella.
